= Date format -
{{{$.forces_date_format(date, format)}}}
Supported formats:
 || {{{YYYY}}} || 4 digit year ||
 || {{{MM}}} || 2 digit month ||
 || {{{DD}}} || 2 digit day of month ||
 || {{{%A}}} || Full weekday (English) ||
 || {{{%B}}} || Full month name (English) ||
